post:
hostworld - 50% OFF RECURRING! SSD cPanel CloudLinux LiteSpeed 99.9% Uptime

SPECIAL OFFER! 50% OFF recurring on monthly or yearly payments using coupon code '50HOSTING' when ordering. Catch this amazing offer whilst you can!

Hello there!

We're hostworld.uk, and we're a UK based web hosting provider. Let's cut to the chase, here are some key things you need to know about us before you buy our plans and join us on your web hosting journey:

  • 24/7 support and lightning fast ticket responses - we respond to all support tickets within 20 minutes on average!
  • We only use state of the art SSD drives in all of our servers - no moving parts means a faster service for you!
  • UK servers - we currently provide our services from UK data centres which provide super-fast connectivity, even if you don't live here!
  • All our web hosting servers are running LiteSpeed. LiteSpeed can serve thousands of clients concurrently and with up to 220% faster loading times than Apache. LiteSpeed also offers great advanced caching support with WordPress using LSCache.
  • We really do care about your hosting experience - talk to us, send us an email, pick up the phone, we're real people striving to provide every single one of our customers with a consistent and reliable hosting experience no matter how much is spent on hosting with us.
  • We're reliable! We provide a 99.9% uptime guarantee because making sure your website is available is essential. You can see our uptime here https://status.hostworld.uk/.

If you need to know anything else about us send an email to sales@hostworld.uk and we'll be back in touch!

--------------------------------------------------------
Uptime Guarantee
--------------------------------------------------------

We are so confident we can offer 99.9% uptime or more that we have an uptime guarantee in place. Every package with us gets our 99.9% uptime guarantee - or your money back. For more information about our uptime guarantee click here.

You can also see our sever status in real time, and the true uptime of our servers. Check it our yourself here http://status.hostworld.uk.

--------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------

Every web hosting plan we offer comes with the following & more as standard.

  • Free SSL Certificates

  • Unlimited Domains

  • Multiple PHP Versions
  • Unlimited Softaculous Installs

  • Daily Backups using JetBackup (unencrypted and encrypted options giving you control over your data!)
  • Instant Activation
    [*]Free Migration
  • 24/7 Support
